M&A_activity.description: Strategic acquisitions to enhance product offerings and capabilities
initiatives: Acquisition of NGCodec to add differentiated video compression software supporting data centers
Acquisition of Solarflare to introduce a new class of SmartNICs for hyperscalers, enterprise, and telco networking customers
goals: Enhance data center and networking product portfolio
Support growth in video acceleration and network bandwidth solutions
examples: NGCodec products gaining traction with Twitch and Alibaba
Solarflare expected to close in Q2 2020

product_updates.description: Advancements and expansions in product lines and platforms
initiatives: Sampling of first 7-nanometer Versal AI Core and Versal Prime Series products
Expanding Zynq™ family with strong demand and crossing $1 billion in cumulative revenue
Introducing 16GB High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) products for adaptable AI Inference and other workloads
Enhancing adaptive computing strategy with Versal platform showcasing at XDF October event
goals: Enhance user experience with unified software development
Advance adaptive computing and AI capabilities
examples: Sampling of Versal products indicating 10x performance increase
Vertex UltraScale+ devices shipping in production

q2_2020.context: Driven by Ryzen™ and EPYC™ processor sales and initial ramp of next-generation semi-custom products

factors: Growth driven by Ryzen™ and EPYC™ sales

expense_outlook_excluding_accrual.note: Expense outlook essentially unchanged from last quarter excluding the $2 billion accrual recorded in Q1

capital_expenditures_guidance.reason_for_adjustment: Expected overall growth rate to moderate in 2019 versus 2018; increased investment in data centers relative to servers

drivers: Investments in technical and product talent
